Pandas

Data Processing

Comprehensive data analysis with statistical operations, data cleaning, transformations, and time series analysis using pandas. Provides powerful data manipulation capabilities for scientific computing workflows.

1.0.0 Version
15 Actions
Jul 19 Updated
Python Language

Installation Methods

Quick Start

cd /path/to/scientific-mcps/Pandas uv sync uv run pandas-mcp

Install Dependencies

uv add fastmcp pandas numpy scipy openpyxl pyarrow tables rich tabulate uv run python -m src.server

Claude Desktop

{ "mcpServers": { "pandas-mcp": { "command": "uv", "args": [ "--directory", "/path/to/scientific-mcps/Pandas", "run", "pandas-mcp" ] } } }

WARP Client

MCP: - Pandas python3 bin/wrp.py --conf=bin/confs/Gemini.yaml

Claude CLI

claude add mcp pandas -- uv --directory ~/path/to/scientific-mcps/Pandas run pandas-mcp

Available Actions

  • load_csv
    Load CSV files into pandas DataFrames for analysis
    Parameters: file_path
  • get_info
    Get detailed information about DataFrame structure and data types
    Parameters: data
  • describe_data
    Generate comprehensive descriptive statistics for all columns
    Parameters: data
  • filter_data
    Filter DataFrame rows based on specified conditions
    Parameters: data, condition
  • sort_data
    Sort DataFrame by one or more columns
    Parameters: data, columns, ascending
  • group_data
    Group data and perform aggregation operations
    Parameters: data, group_by, aggregations
  • merge_data
    Merge multiple DataFrames using various join operations
    Parameters: left_data, right_data, on, how
  • pivot_data
    Create pivot tables for data reshaping and analysis
    Parameters: data, index, columns, values, aggfunc
  • clean_data
    Clean data by removing duplicates and handling inconsistencies
    Parameters: data, remove_duplicates
  • handle_missing
    Handle missing values through various strategies
    Parameters: data, strategy, columns
  • detect_outliers
    Detect outliers using statistical methods
    Parameters: data, columns, method
  • correlation_analysis
    Calculate correlation matrices between numerical columns
    Parameters: data, method
  • time_series_analysis
    Perform time series analysis and trend detection
    Parameters: data, date_column, value_column
  • resample_data
    Resample time series data with different frequencies
    Parameters: data, date_column, frequency, aggregation
  • export_data
    Export processed data to various formats
    Parameters: data, file_path, format

Usage Examples

Basic Data Analysis

result = load_data("/data/employees.csv", encoding="utf-8") stats = statistical_summary("/data/employees.csv", columns=["salary", "age", "years_experience"], include_distributions=True)

Data Cleaning Pipeline

missing_handled = handle_missing_data("/data/dataset.csv", strategy="mean", columns=["price", "quantity"]) cleaned = clean_data("/data/dataset.csv", remove_duplicates=True, detect_outliers=True, convert_types=True)

Advanced Transformations

grouped = groupby_operations("/data/sales.csv", group_by=["region", "category"], operations={"revenue": "sum", "quantity": "mean"}) pivot = pivot_table("/data/sales.csv", index=["date"], columns=["category"], values=["revenue"], aggfunc="sum")

Time Series Analysis

resampled = time_series_operations("/data/timeseries.csv", date_column="timestamp", operation="resample", frequency="M") rolling = time_series_operations("/data/timeseries.csv", date_column="timestamp", operation="rolling_mean")
